Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class GameHandler extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
GameHandler's class receives messages from clients through ClientHandler class and propagates them to GameController, in order to change the model's state.

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameHandler(Server server, HashMap<String,ClientHandler> nameToHandlerMap, boolean expertGame)
    Constructor GameHandler creates a new GameHandler instance by receiving a reference to the Server, the list of clients that are taking part in the game and their relative ClientHandler reference.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameHandler

      public GameHandler(Server server, HashMap<String,ClientHandler> nameToHandlerMap, boolean expertGame)
      Constructor GameHandler creates a new GameHandler instance by receiving a reference to the Server, the list of clients that are taking part in the game and their relative ClientHandler reference. It also holds the mode of the new game.
      Parameters:
      server - : Server instance holding information about the clients and the server state.
      nameToHandlerMap - : HashMap containing the associations between a client's nickname and his ClientHandler instance.
      expertGame - : game mode for the game managed by GameHandler.

  • Method Details

    • handleMessage

      public void handleMessage(Message message, ClientHandler clientHandler)
      It manages messages from the client by calling the proper method according the message instance.
      Parameters:
      message - : instance of the client's message
      clientHandler - : ClientHandler instance of the player sending messages.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      It starts a new game by instantiating a new GameController and by setting the listener system. It also communicates to the players the model's initial status.

    • startPlanningPhase

      private void startPlanningPhase()
      It manages the beginning of the planning phase of a new round: the first player is required to choose a new assistant card which will decide the action's order for the next phase. The other players are sent a message telling them to wait for their turn.

    • startActionPhase

      private void startActionPhase()
      It manages the beginning of a new action phase by sending the highest priority's player a message notifying his status. The other players are sent a message telling them to wait for their turn.

    • updatePlayersOrder

      private void updatePlayersOrder(ArrayList<String> players)
      It updates the order by which players are required to take action in the game.
      Parameters:
      players - : names of the active players.

    • handleWizardSelectionMessage

      private void handleWizardSelectionMessage(WizardSelectionMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      It manages the selection of a wizard card by a player: the choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : WizardSelectionMessage instance carrying the choice sent by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleTowerSelectionMessage

      private void handleTowerSelectionMessage(TowerSelectionMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      It manages the selection of a tower color by a player: the choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : TowerSelectionMessage instance carrying the choice sent by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handlePlayAssistantCardMessage

      private void handlePlayAssistantCardMessage(PlayAssistantCardMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      It manages the selection of an assistant card by a player: the choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : PlayAssistantCardMessage instance carrying the choice sent by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleMoveStudentMessage

      private void handleMoveStudentMessage(MoveStudentsFromLobbyMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      It manages the students' movement from the board's lobby by a player: the choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : MoveStudentsFromLobbyMessage instance carrying the choice sent by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleMoveMotherNatureMessage

      private void handleMoveMotherNatureMessage(MotherNatureMoveMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      It manages Mother Nature tile's number of steps chose by a player: the choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client. If the resulting move brings the game to an end all players are commmunicated the state and the match is closed.
      Parameters:
      message - : MotherNatureMoveMessage instance carrying the choice sent by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleCloudPick

      private void handleCloudPick(CloudSelectionMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      It manages a cloud's selection by a player: the choice is communicated to the GameController,whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : CloudSelectionMessage instance carrying the choice sent by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleEndTurn

      private void handleEndTurn(CloseTurnMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      It manages a player's turn end: he is told he needs to wait for the other players to play, while the next player is sent a message notifying him his status.
      Parameters:
      message - : CloseTurnMessage instance communicating the choice sent by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handlePlayPersonalityCard

      private void handlePlayPersonalityCard(PlayPersonalityCardMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      It manages player's personality card's selection: the choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : PlayPersonalityCardMessage instance carrying the personality choice.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleCard1Effect

      private void handleCard1Effect(Card1EffectMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      This method is responsible for the sequence of events related to the effect of Personality 1: the player's choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - Card1EffectMessage instance carrying the student and island choice made by the player.
      client - ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleCard3Effect

      private void handleCard3Effect(Card3EffectMessage message, ClientHandler client)

      Parameters:
      message - : Card3EffectMessage instance carrying the island choice made by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

      Parameters:
      message - : Card5EffectMessage instance carrying the island choice made by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleCard7Effect

      private void handleCard7Effect(Card7EffectMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      This method is responsible for the sequence of events related to the effect of Personality 7: the player's choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : Card7EffectMessage instance carrying the students choice made by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleCard9Effect

      private void handleCard9Effect(Card9EffectMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      This method is responsible for the sequence of events related to the effect of Personality 9: the player's choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : Card9EffectMessage instance carrying the color choice made by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleCard10Effect

      private void handleCard10Effect(Card10EffectMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      This method is responsible for the sequence of events related to the effect of Personality 10: the player's choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : Card10EffectMessage instance carrying the students choice made by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleCard11Effect

      private void handleCard11Effect(Card11EffectMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      It handles the sequence of events related to the effect of Personality 11: the player's choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : Card11EffectMessage instance carrying the student choice made by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleCard12Effect

      private void handleCard12Effect(Card12EffectMessage message, ClientHandler client)
      It handles the sequence of events related to the effect of Personality 12: the player's choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - : Card12EffectMessage instance carrying the student choice made by the player.
      client - : ClientHandler instance handling the player's connection.

    • handleEndRound

      private void handleEndRound()
      It manages the end of current round: based on the game conditions, if it was the last one it communicates the game result to all players and proceeds to close the match. Otherwise, a new planning phase takes place.

    • closeMatch

      public void closeMatch()
      It closes a match by communicating to all clients the game has ended. Then it proceeds to close socket connections to all clients and to remove the GameHandler's instance from the server registry.

    • sendTo

      private void sendTo(String nickname, Message message)
      It sends a serialized message to a single client through socket connection.
      Parameters:
      nickname - : name of the player whom the message is being sent.
      message - : Message instance being sent to the player.

    • sendAll

      private void sendAll(Message message)
      It sends a serialized message to all clients involved in the game.
      Parameters:
      message - : Message instance being sent to the players.

    • sendAllExcept

      private void sendAllExcept(ClientHandler except, Message message)
      It sends a serialized message to all clients except the one linked to the ClientHandler's except instance.
      Parameters:
      except - : ClientHandler's instance of the player who is being excluded from the message.
      message - : Message instance being sent to all players bar one.

    • setServer

      public void setServer(ServerSocketConnection serverConnection)
      It sets the class serverConnection attribute referencing the object responsible for the socket Connection.
      Parameters:
      serverConnection - : ServerSocketConnection's instance handling the socket.

    • removeClientHandler

      public void removeClientHandler(ClientHandler clientHandler)
      It removes a ClientHandler's instance from the clientHandler's registry.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - : ClientHandler instance that is being removed from the registry.

    • getNicknameFromClientID

      private String getNicknameFromClientID(int clientID)
      It extracts a player's name by its clientHandler's identification number.
      Parameters:
      clientID - : ClientHandler's identification number.
      Returns:
      the name of the player linked to the ClientHandler's clientId.

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Method propertyChange receives an update notification from the GameController and sends all client a serialized message containing the information about the update.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - event of type PropertyChangeEvent
